name: Squarism
description: SQUARISM is a minimalist logic game about combining pieces scattered around into a perfect square. Complete all 70 lovely-crafted levels and become master of square assembling!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: Would be nice
